name: Shikari Robot
description: Advanced Telegram Group Management Bot made for Managing your group effectively with some advance security tools❤️.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Telegram bot token get it from  @BotFather

API_ID.description: API_ID of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

API_HASH.description: API_HASH of your Telegram Account my.telegram.org/apps

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: For logs channel to note down important bot level events, recommend to make this public. ex: '-123456'

DEV_USERS.description: ID of users who are Devs of your bot (can use /py etc.). If you are a noob and would come and bother Masha support then keep the current ID's here at they are and add yours.

OWNER_ID.description: User ID Of The Owner Of Bot
